title: EyeTV 3.1 (Build 4513) [SN]
description:
EyeTV software, together with a compatible Mac TV tuner, turns your Macintosh into much more than just a television. The latest version of our award-winning software is called EyeTV 3, and it offers: 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢    DVR (digital video recorder) functionality - Pause and rewind live TV. Set up Smart Schedules to record your favorite shows automatically. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢    Comprehensive Program Guide - EyeTV goes way beyond the basic program information that you get with digital TV. EyeTV offers detailed descriptions of upcoming programs, including actors, genres, release dates and much more. EyeTV makes it easy to find shows you'll like, and even easier to automatically record them.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢    Editing capabilities - Easily edit your recordings to remove unwanted material, or create clips of your favorite TV moments.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢    Export to any format - Export and share your recordings with other Macs, iPods, iPhones or Apple TVs. You can even watch your recordings on a standard web browser.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢    Capture from old videotapes -  Use EyeTV to transfer your old analog video tapes into a digital format. EyeTV Hybrid and 250 Plus feature video inputs so you can hook up your VCR and capture those precious old tapes. Once the video is in EyeTV you can burn it to DVD for safe keeping.

Elgato has combined EyeTV 3 software with high quality TV tuner/encoder hardware to bring you our award-winning EyeTV solutions. We have a number of Mac TV solutions to meet your needs, depending on the type of TV signals broadcast in your area and the type of TV reception service you use or subscribe to.

For more flexibility, buy the software on its own and use it with approved third party hardware to create your own custom solution. Elgato also licenses a light version of EyeTV 3 software to several partners, including Pinnacle, Hauppague, and TerraTec. EyeTV lite offers rich, full-screen functionality, and is perfect for anyone who simply wants to watch and record TV on a Mac. EyeTV lite customers can upgrade to the full version at a discounted price.

get more at http://iBrain.com.ua
